data.text:
The winner of the race, Mejiro McQueen, unfortunately blocked the 
Uma Musume behind her from progressing through the course…
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The winner of the race, Mejiro McQueen, unfortunately blocked the 
<story>Uma Musume behind her from progressing through the course…

data.text: Therefore, we will be lowering her placement to 18th place.
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>Therefore, we will be lowering her placement to 18th place.

data.text:
On that day, Mejiro Mcqueen had an amazing start and rushed into 
the inside of the track to ensure she'd be able to stay in a 
good position moving forward in the race.
data.processed:
<story>On that day, Mejiro Mcqueen had an amazing start and rushed into 
<story>the inside of the track to ensure she'd be able to stay in a 
<story>good position moving forward in the race.

data.text:
However, doing this left the Uma Musume behind her with nowhere 
to go, putting them at risk of toppling over.
data.processed:
<story>However, doing this left the Uma Musume behind her with nowhere 
<story>to go, putting them at risk of toppling over.

data.text:
This devastating incident was the result of the Uma Musume that 
was most favored to win, Mejiro McQueen. As such, her actions 
were widely reported in the media.
data.processed:
<story>This devastating incident was the result of the Uma Musume that 
<story>was most favored to win, Mejiro McQueen. As such, her actions 
<story>were widely reported in the media.

data.text: McQueen… Are you okay?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>McQueen… Are you okay?

data.text: Eh!? Oh, of course I am.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Eh!? Oh, of course I am.

data.text:
While it is true that I was unable to live up 
to my fan's expectations, and that I put the other 
Uma Musume in that race in danger…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>While it is true that I was unable to live up 
<story>to my fan's expectations, and that I put the other 
<story>Uma Musume in that race in danger…

data.text: That is exactly why I mustn't feel dejected.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>That is exactly why I mustn't feel dejected.

data.text: I will make up for my blunder during that race.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I will make up for my blunder during that race.

data.text:
You're beating yourself up over this, aren't you? Please don't 
blame yourself more than necessary.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>You're beating yourself up over this, aren't you? Please don't 
<story>blame yourself more than necessary.

data.text: I agree! You're going to do great in the next race, I know it!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>I agree! You're going to do great in the next race, I know it!

data.text: You can do it, McQueen-san!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

choices.text: Let's use this as a learning experience.
choices.processed: <size=42>Let's use this as a learning experience.</size>

data.processed: <story>You can do it, McQueen-san!

data.text: Yes, of course I will.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes, of course I will.

data.text: Oye, I'm back!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Oye, I'm back!

data.text:
There were some people out there with cameras and stuff. Don't 
worry though, I caused a scene by calling ‘em degenerates for ya!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>There were some people out there with cameras and stuff. Don't 
<story>worry though, I caused a scene by calling ‘em degenerates for ya!

data.text: Those were reporters… weren't they?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Those were reporters… weren't they?

data.text: They must have been waiting outside to interview me.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>They must have been waiting outside to interview me.

data.text:
Hmm? Isn't it better this way then? To come this far into campus 
without being a student, there's no doubt they were scoundrels.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Isn't it better this way then? To come this far into campus 
<story>without being a student, there's no doubt they were scoundrels.

data.text:
I'd imagine they'd leave soon enough, but maybe we should call 
off training for today since they're here…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I'd imagine they'd leave soon enough, but maybe we should call 
<story>off training for today since they're here…

data.text:
I don't mind if they're here. In fact, if they have any questions 
I would be happy to answer them with sincerity.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I don't mind if they're here. In fact, if they have any questions 
<story>I would be happy to answer them with sincerity.

data.text:
Moreover, I need to make sure that I win my next race so that we 
can have some favorable news coverage.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Moreover, I need to make sure that I win my next race so that we 
<story>can have some favorable news coverage.

data.text:
Now then, I've gotten myself all excited for some 
exercise. I'm heading out, Trainer-san!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Now then, I've gotten myself all excited for some 
<story>exercise. I'm heading out, Trainer-san!

data.text: Ah… okay…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Ah… okay…

data.text: Ah… okay…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Ah… okay…

data.text:
The dormitory is right there, you know? I won't 
get lost, so you don't need to walk me back…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>The dormitory is right there, you know? I won't 
<story>get lost, so you don't need to walk me back…

data.text: But I'm sure the reporters will by lying in wait for you.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>But I'm sure the reporters will by lying in wait for you.

data.text: I told you that I didn't mind answering them though…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I told you that I didn't mind answering them though…

data.text:
Ah, McQueen-san! Do you have a comment regarding 
what happened durin the Spring Tenno Sho?
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>Ah, McQueen-san! Do you have a comment regarding 
<story>what happened durin the Spring Tenno Sho?

data.text: Why did you run in such a dangerous manner!?
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed: <story>Why did you run in such a dangerous manner!?

data.text:
I apologize immensely for any inconvenience my actions may have 
caused to the other individuals participating in that race.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I apologize immensely for any inconvenience my actions may have 
<story>caused to the other individuals participating in that race.

data.text:
I lacked experience, and as such was not conscious of those 
around me, which led to that incident occurring.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I lacked experience, and as such was not conscious of those 
<story>around me, which led to that incident occurring.

data.text:
What have you done to appease those that 
you have hindered with your actions?
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>What have you done to appease those that 
<story>you have hindered with your actions?

data.text: I have apologized to each and every one of them.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I have apologized to each and every one of them.

data.text:
Is it true that your trainer instructed you to force 
your way into the inside of the course?
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>Is it true that your trainer instructed you to force 
<story>your way into the inside of the course?

data.text:
Trainer-san instructed me to do that!? I 
can assure you that is not the case!!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san instructed me to do that!? I 
<story>can assure you that is not the case!!

data.text:
My actions were purely based on my own judgement! Trainer-san has 
nothing to do with what happened!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>My actions were purely based on my own judgement! Trainer-san has 
<story>nothing to do with what happened!

data.text:
Until now, all of Mejiro McQueen's answers were filled with 
composure. However, that all changed in an instant.
data.processed:
<story>Until now, all of Mejiro McQueen's answers were filled with 
<story>composure. However, that all changed in an instant.

data.text:
She said that she “would be happy to answer them with sincerity.” 
If this is what she believes is the right thing to do then it 
isn't my place to interfere.
data.processed:
<story>She said that she “would be happy to answer them with sincerity.” 
<story>If this is what she believes is the right thing to do then it 
<story>isn't my place to interfere.

data.text:
That being said, I can't just stand here quietly as she attempts 
to put all of the blame onto herself.
data.processed:
<story>That being said, I can't just stand here quietly as she attempts 
<story>to put all of the blame onto herself.

data.text:
That being said, I can't just stand here quietly as she attempts 
to put all of the blame onto herself.
data.processed:
<story>That being said, I can't just stand here quietly as she attempts 
<story>to put all of the blame onto herself.

data.text:
But if we do that, they'll think that 
you're to blame for what I did…!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>But if we do that, they'll think that 
<story>you're to blame for what I did…!

data.text:
Regardless of what I instructed her to do, the 
responsibility lies with me since I am her trainer. 
For that, I too apologize.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Regardless of what I instructed her to do, the 
<story>responsibility lies with me since I am her trainer. 
<story>For that, I too apologize.

data.text: Trainer-san!!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san!!

data.text: Now let's go, McQueen.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Now let's go, McQueen.

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Don't worry about what happened, McQueen. You gave it your all in 
that race, so there's no need to beat yourself up over it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Don't worry about what happened, McQueen. You gave it your all in 
<story>that race, so there's no need to beat yourself up over it.

data.text:
Don't worry about what happened, McQueen. You gave it your all in 
that race, so there's no need to beat yourself up over it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Don't worry about what happened, McQueen. You gave it your all in 
<story>that race, so there's no need to beat yourself up over it.

data.text:
You don't plan on feeling dejected, right? Then let's 
concentrate on the upcoming race instead.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You don't plan on feeling dejected, right? Then let's 
<story>concentrate on the upcoming race instead.

data.text:
You don't plan on feeling dejected, right? Then let's 
concentrate on the upcoming race instead.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You don't plan on feeling dejected, right? Then let's 
<story>concentrate on the upcoming race instead.

data.text: Understood…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Understood…

data.text: Umm… Trainer-san…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Umm… Trainer-san…

data.text:
I know that we had planned for the Arima Kinen to be my next 
race, but I would like to race in the Japan Cup before that.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I know that we had planned for the Arima Kinen to be my next 
<story>race, but I would like to race in the Japan Cup before that.

data.text:
Are you sure? You're probably still 
fatigued from your previous race…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Are you sure? You're probably still 
<story>fatigued from your previous race…

data.text: Don't worry about that. I'm already ready for another race.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Don't worry about that. I'm already ready for another race.

data.text: So please allow me to race in the Japan Cup.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>So please allow me to race in the Japan Cup.

data.text:
Mejiro McQueen likely wanted to make up for her blunder at the 
Spring Tenno Sho as soon as possible by entering the Japan Cup.
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro McQueen likely wanted to make up for her blunder at the 
<story>Spring Tenno Sho as soon as possible by entering the Japan Cup.

data.text:
She would use this race as a way to atone for what she did to 
appease those who had put their faith in her, and to appease 
those who she had inconvenienced.

choices.text: Fine… You can race in the Japan Cup next.
choices.processed: <size=39>Fine… You can race in the Japan Cup next.</size>

choices.text: Fine… You can race in the Japan Cup next.
choices.processed: <size=39>Fine… You can race in the Japan Cup next.</size>

data.processed:
<story>She would use this race as a way to atone for what she did to 
<story>appease those who had put their faith in her, and to appease 
<story>those who she had inconvenienced.

data.text: Thank you. I will… I will definitely win this race.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Thank you. I will… I will definitely win this race.

data.text: (Wooooooaaaaah!!)
data.processed: <story>(Wooooooaaaaah!!)

data.text:
McQueen is struggling to bridge the gap! In fact, the gap between 
her and first place is only widening!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>McQueen is struggling to bridge the gap! In fact, the gap between 
<story>her and first place is only widening!

data.text: The favorite to win, Mejiro McQueen, has finished in 4th place!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: <story>The favorite to win, Mejiro McQueen, has finished in 4th place!
